feature.label: Picos ARM Tools and New Projects
feature.description: Tool set for easy configuration of a workspace and creation of embedded ARM projects for LPC8xx and Nucleo. It aims at providing an easy way of work on eclipse on windows PC's with the jeelabs/embello github repository.
